author: felixk
msg: Always show vertical scrollbar to avoid centered content jumping left/right depending on the length of the content (vertical scrollbar needed or not)

author: fielding
msg: Adjust content metadata on deflate/inflate response before bailing out
on a 304 response so that the metadata does not differ from 200 response.

author: gnodet
msg: SMX4NMR-79: If the JBI artifact deployed has a MANIFEST.MF which is not the first entry in the jar, it leads to an exception when writing the transformed jar
